Avoid contrast changes

For systems that present content, people may need to avoid changes to the foreground color that reduce the contrast with the background color.

Comment on this item

Mappings

Required abilityAccessibility characteristicSupport needed
VisualStatic contentAvoid
VisualChanges in contentAvoid
VisualMultidimensional contentAvoid
VisualTime-based contentAvoid

References

  • Reference: 5-3-2-a to be protected from changing the foreground colour to one that cannot be distinguished from the background colour

Tags

  • unsure
